titles.title: Expressing agreement with the statements of the Speaker of the House of Representatives made on July 16, 2018, regarding Russian Federation interference in the 2016 United States elections and related matters.

Expressing agreement with the statements of the Speaker of the House of Representatives made on July 16, 2018, regarding Russian Federation interference in the 2016 United States elections and related matters.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: Expresses the agreement of the House of Representatives with the statements made by the Speaker of the House on July 16, 2018, regarding Russian interference in the 2016 elections.
